@graph.name: Almond Feta, Mushroom, greens, olives, golden cherry tomatoes. Vegan Mediterranean Pizza with Thin Herbed Spelt Crust. vegan recipe - Vegan Richa

itemListElement.name: Almond Feta, Mushroom, greens, olives, golden cherry tomatoes. Vegan Mediterranean Pizza with Thin Herbed Spelt Crust. vegan recipe

@graph.name: Almond Feta, Mushroom, greens, olives, golden cherry tomatoes. Vegan Mediterranean Pizza with Thin Herbed Spelt Crust. vegan recipe
@graph.description: Vegan Mediterranean Pizza with Almond Feta, Mushroom, greens, olives, golden cherry tomatoes. Vegan Soy-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: a generous pinch of garlic powder (dried parsley, dried basil and paprika)
2-3 tablespoons spelt flour to work the dough
black pepper to taste (Or use a light sprinkle of dukkah spice blend)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix warm water, sugar and yeast and let sit until frothy(10 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix warm water, sugar and yeast and let sit until frothy(10 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flours, salt, herbs and evoo.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flours, salt, herbs and evoo.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix and knead for a minute, spray water on top and cover with a damp towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix and knead for a minute, spray water on top and cover with a damp towel.

recipeInstructions.text: Use some spelt flour and oiled hands to gather the dough and knead for 3-4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Use some spelt flour and oiled hands to gather the dough and knead for 3-4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Roll this dough out to as thin as possible on parchment.
recipeInstructions.name: Roll this dough out to as thin as possible on parchment.

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the baby greens, golden cherry tomatoes, olives and mushrooms.
recipeInstructions.name: Arrange the baby greens, golden cherry tomatoes, olives and mushrooms.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the spices and bake in preheated 410 degrees F  / 210ºc for 12-13 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle the spices and bake in preheated 410 degrees F  / 210ºc for 12-13 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Broil on low for half a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Broil on low for half a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Take out of the oven, top with fresh baby greens/chopped basil, cut and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Take out of the oven, top with fresh baby greens/chopped basil, cut and serve.
